This section shows how to use the examples available in the [github.com/d3/d3/wiki/Gallery](https://github.com/d3/d3/wiki/Gallery) gallery, the R examples can be found in [github.com/rstudio/r2d3/tree/master/inst/samples](https://github.com/rstudio/r2d3/tree/master/inst/samples).


## Bullets

[bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4061961](https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4061961)

```{r eval=FALSE}
r2d3(
  jsonlite::read_json("bullets.json"),
  "bullets.js",
  d3_version = 3,
  container = "div",
  dependencies = c("bullets.css", "helper.js"),
  height = 300
)
```
```{r echo=FALSE}
r2d3::r2d3(
  jsonlite::read_json(system.file("samples/bullets/bullets.json", package = "r2d3")),
  system.file("samples/bullets/bullets.js", package = "r2d3"),
  d3_version = 3,
  container = "div",
  dependencies = c(
    system.file("samples/bullets/bullets.css", package = "r2d3"),
    system.file("samples/bullets/helper.js", package = "r2d3")
  ),
  height = 300
)
```

## Calendar

[bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4063318](https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4063318)

```{r eval=FALSE}
r2d3(
  read.csv("dji.csv"),
  "calendar.js",
  d3_version = 4,
  container = "div",
  height = 1950
)
```
```{r echo=FALSE}
r2d3::r2d3(
  read.csv(system.file("samples/calendar/dji.csv", package = "r2d3")),
  system.file("samples/calendar/calendar.js", package = "r2d3"),
  d3_version = 4,
  container = "div",
  height = 1950
)
```
